comments:
New failure in 3.2M6, works fine in 3.2M5.  

Steps to Reproduce:
1) Create a fresh workspace, and load a C/C++ project.
2) Open resource perspective.
3) Open the project and select any compilation unit, double-click to open.
4) Constant error dialogs appear ("Error notifying a preference change listener.  Check the log for details")

The log shows:

FYI: The Ant had an (on the surface) similar looking issue last month due to a change in ScopedPreferenceStore.  Here's the reference: https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=130751
this should already be fixed for 3.1 (HEAD).

Version: 3.2.1
Build id: M20060921-0945

Anyone knows which version has the fix for the problem?
